description: This file defines an interface class IFactories within the WPEFramework::PluginHost namespace. It provides virtual methods for returning proxy types of various web request and response objects, suggesting its role in factory pattern implementation for web components. The file also includes typedefs for deprecated classes, indicating some legacy support.

classes.name: IFactories
classes.description: An interface class providing methods to obtain proxy objects for web request/response handling, file bodies, and JSON RPC messages within the framework.

methods.name: Assign
methods.description: Assigns an instance of IFactories (static method).

methods.name: Instance
methods.description: Returns the singleton instance of IFactories (static method).

methods.name: IsAvailable
methods.description: Checks if the IFactories instance is available (static method).

methods.name: Request
methods.description: Returns a proxy to a Web::Request object.

methods.name: Response
methods.description: Returns a proxy to a Web::Response object.

methods.name: FileBody
methods.description: Returns a proxy to a Web::FileBody object.

methods.name: JSONRPC
methods.description: Returns a proxy to a Web::JSONBodyType of Core::JSONRPC::Message.
